FuncDef:
The tunnel-id command configures a tunnel ID for a GMPLS UNI tunnel.
The undo tunnel-id command deletes the tunnel ID configured for a GMPLS UNI tunnel.
By default, no tunnel ID is configured for a GMPLS UNI tunnel.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the tunnel ID of a GMPLS UNI tunnel.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 32768.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
During GMPLS UNI tunnel configuration, the tunnel-id command must be used to configure a tunnel ID of the GMPLS UNI tunnel. A tunnel ID uniquely specifies a tunnel on a device. Tunnel IDs facilitate tunnel planning and management when GMPLS UNI tunnels are used.
Precautions
The tunnel-id command must be run before tunnel configurations are committed. Otherwise, no tunnel will be created.
